document.full_text: stunned residents of the southern university town of tuscaloosa on thursday surveyed a shocking landscape of twisted wreckage left by one of the biggest tornadoes ever to hit the state of alabama.
document.title: monster twister leaves ruin in alabama college town
lines_and_colors: stunned residents of the southern university town of tuscaloosa on thursday surveyed a shocking landscape of twisted wreckage left by one of the biggest tornadoes ever to hit the state of alabama.
